name: structurizr
description: Diagrams for architecture ...

name: Conventional commit
description: Easy set of rules for creating an explicit commit history

name: Amazon Web Services
description: Single place for many services ...

name: Elixir
description: More and more project inside Casavo uses ...

name: [Elixir] Commanded
description: Reference to build CQRS/ES in Elixir

name: Rust
description: Too few people with strong knowledges

name: TypeScript
description: The replacement for plain JavaScript

name: GraphQL
description: Data query and manipulation language for APIs

name: [GraphQL] Apollo
description: Reference implementation for GraphQL on frontend and backend side, not actually practical to be used, other simpler solutions may be adeguate

name: Hasura
description: Allows to provide GraphQL API starting from databases with simple configuration and no code.

name: Next.js
description: When you need more than a single page application.

name: React
description: The one and only library for component-based user interfaces. More standard way to build HTML than Angular.

name: Redux
description: Needed for mobile application, to be evaluated on web side as state manager for React (sometime a simpler solution could be enough)

name: React Router
description: https://reactrouter.com - To be used (react-router-dom) on SPA not leveraging on full Next.js stack

name: React Bricks
description: CMS for Next.js based on React components. https://reactbricks.com

name: Emotion
description: Library designed for writing css styles with JavaScript. Currently evaluating if can be replaced by Vanilla Extract

name: Vanilla Extract
description: Zero-runtime CSS-in-JS library with build-time styles extraction. https://vanilla-extract.style -- Currently evaluating if can replace Emotion

name: Stitches
description: https://stitches.dev - Tried as replacement for Emotion, community stopped their development efforts. Switch back to Emotion or Vanilla Extract

name: Formik & Yup
description: Build forms in React with input validation, formatting, masking, arrays, and error handling -- https://formik.org & https://github.com/jquense/yup

name: Vite
description: Build system for SPAs with dev server, see https://vitejs.dev - Could be used when starting a new project as replacement for simple create-react-app and when you do no need the full Next.js stack

name: Cypress
description: Test automation for modern web applications, see https://www.cypress.io - Used by now for "e2e" testsing, not for component testing.

name: Kotlin
description: Viable alternative to Java on back end side (be wise when choosing a framework), needed on mobile app

name: [Kotlin] Quarkus
description: Nice alternative to Spring, describe here why ready for use, but not completely proven to be in adopt

name: [Kotlin] JobRunr
description: Solid framework for background jobs in Java world ...

name: Python
description: reference language for application development and data management

name: [Python] FastAPI
description: web framework for building APIs

name: [Python] SQLAlchemy
description: SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

name: [Python] celery
description: asynchronous task queue or job queue which is based on distributed message passing

name: [Python] Emmett
description: full stack web framework

name: Drone
description: Superseded by github actions

name: Github Actions
description: Automated software workflows

name: ArgoCD
description: Superseded by helm

name: Kustomization
description: Superseded by helm

name: Helm
description: Manage kubernetes applications

name: EFK
description: The stack Elasticsearch, Flutent Kibana has been superseded in favor of Loki + Grafana

name: Loki
description: Log aggregation system powered by Grafana Labs

name: Prometheus
description: Monitoring system & time series database

name: Grafana
description: Visualize observability metrics

name: DBT
description: data transformation and data pipelines - https://www.getdbt.com

name: Pytorch Lightning
description: deep learning framework - https://www.pytorchlightning.ai/

name: lightGBM
description: training boosting framework - https://lightgbm.readthedocs.io/

name: DVC
description: Version Control System for Machine Learning Projects - https://dvc.org/

name: Streamlit
description: Python library that makes it easy to create and share beautiful, custom web apps for machine learning and data science - https://streamlit.io

name: CML
description: CI/CD for Machine Learning Projects - https://cml.dev/

name: gradio
description: Interactive demo for machine learning models - https://gradio.app - used for a couple of POCs, but not sure we would use it in production

name: bentoML
description: simplifies Machine-Learning model deployment and serves models at production scale - https://www.bentoml.com/ - waiting for release 1.0 to decide whether to keep it or go for something else

name: Argo Workflows
description: Container-native workflow engine for orchestrating parallel jobs on Kubernetes - https://argoproj.github.io/workflows/
